title: Gans and Nelson on Bank of America Versus City of Miami (Audio)
itunes:title: Gans and Nelson on Bank of America Versus City of Miami (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- David Gans, Director of the Human Rights, Civil Rights, and Citizenship Program at the Constitutional Accountability Center, and Matthew Nelson, a Partner at Warner Norcross and Judd LLP, will discuss the Supreme Court Decision in Bank of America v. City of Miami. They speak with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
